channel.title: Alerts Feed
channel.description: Alerts Feeds -- Los Angeles Fire Department

item.description: Knockdown - Structure Fire; INC#0557; 09:33AM; 901 E 20th St; MAP: <a href="https://bit.ly/3RIvATA" target="_blank" rel="noopener">https://bit.ly/3RIvATA</a>; #HistoricSouthCentral; 32 Firefighters took just 15 minutes to access, confine and extinguish stubborn flames, confining fire to the structure. No injury. Fire cause under investigation.; FS 14; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 9; BC1 BC11 E10 E209 E221 E9 FR9 RA14 RA814 SO1 SQ21 T21 T9; CH9; 12; Brian Humphrey

Structure Fire; INC#0557; 09:18AM; 901 E 20th St; MAP: <a href="https://bit.ly/3RIvATA" target="_blank" rel="noopener">https://bit.ly/3RIvATA</a>; #HistoricSouthCentral; PRELIM: Detached garage or shed well involved with fire, to the rear of a one-story home, with flames threatening a diesel generator. ; FS 14; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 9; BC1 BC11 E10 E209 E221 E9 FR9 RA14 RA814 SQ21 T21 T9; CH9; 12; Brian Humphrey

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1459; 06:35PM; 2379 S Prosser Av; MAP: <a href="https://bit.ly/3xBWllV" target="_blank" rel="noopener">https://bit.ly/3xBWllV</a>; #WestLA; 48 firefighters extinguished this fire in 21 minutes using a coordinated fire attack; crews made access both via the roof and via forcible entry on ground level. Fire and pressurized smoke were confirmed in the attic space above a unit doing business as a nail spa. Companies remain on-scene for overhaul and salvage operations. The fire cause is unknown and under investigation.; FS 92; Batt 18; South Bureau; Council District 5; BC18 BC4 BC5 BC9 CM40 CM42 E19 E205 E237 E261 E263 E292 E43 E5 E58 E59 E71 E95 EM9 HR3 RA59 RA92 SQ95 T37 T5 T61 T63 T92 UR5 UR88; CH9; 12 13; Lyndsey Lantz

Structure Fire; INC#1459; 06:35PM; 2375 S Prosser Ave; MAP: <a href="https://bit.ly/3xBWllV" target="_blank" rel="noopener">https://bit.ly/3xBWllV</a>; #WestLA; Companies on-scene report a one-story row of commercial businesses, with light smoke showing from one unit. Companies will be both making entry and going to the roof in offensive mode.; FS 92; Batt 18; South Bureau; Council District 5; BC18 BC9 E237 E261 E292 E43 E58 E59 RA59 RA92 T37 T61 T92; CH9; 12; Lyndsey Lantz

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1323; 05:27PM; 5874 S Figueroa St; MAP: <a href="https://bit.ly/4cwJ2So" target="_blank" rel="noopener">https://bit.ly/4cwJ2So</a>; Vermont-Slauson; Flames were fully extinguished in this vacant one-story dwelling by 42 firefighters within 20 minutes. Companies on-scene transitioned into "defensive mode" (less risk to firefighter lives), as the house was confirmed to have no occupants inside. Two companies remain on-scene for overhaul of the fire damage.; FS 33; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 9; BC11 BC13 E15 E21 E221 E233 E266 E46 RA33 RA857 SQ21 T21 T33 T66; CH9; 12; Lyndsey Lantz

Structure Fire; INC#1323; 05:07PM; 5874 S Figueroa St; MAP: <a href="https://bit.ly/4cwJ2So" target="_blank" rel="noopener">https://bit.ly/4cwJ2So</a>; #Vermont-Slauson; First-arriving companies report a vacant one-story single family dwelling -- moderate smoke showing and fire in the attic. Responders are in offensive mode, coordinating the fire attack between companies on the roof and inside the house.; FS 33; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 9; BC11 BC13 E15 E21 E221 E233 E266 RA33 RA857 SQ21 T21 T33 T66; CH9; 12; Lyndsey Lantz

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0913; 01:21PM; 9076 N Lev Av; MAP: <a href="https://bit.ly/4cy2j67" target="_blank" rel="noopener">https://bit.ly/4cy2j67</a>; #Arleta; *Corrected address: 9076 North Lev Avenue.* The attic fire in this single family dwelling proved stubborn due to blown-in insulation in the attic that held pockets of heat and embers. Full extinguishment was completed in 25 minutes by first-arriving companies, who coordinated efforts from above and below the fire to contain and douse it. The house was confirmed under construction and unoccupied at the time of the fire, with no injuries to civilians or firefighters. Fire cause remains under investigation.; FS 7; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 6; BC10 BC12 BC14 CM40 CM42 E289 E290 E298 E77 E81 E89 E90 EA1 EM15 RA7 RA77 RA98 T89 T90 T98; CH9; 17; Lyndsey Lantz

Structure Fire; INC#0913; 12:56PM; 9070 N Lev Av; MAP: <a href="https://bit.ly/4cy2j67" target="_blank" rel="noopener">https://bit.ly/4cy2j67</a>; #Arleta; First arriving companies report a one-story single family dwelling, under construction, with moderate smoke showing and fire contained to the attic. Firefighters will be in offensive mode, making access into the structure and onto the roof to fight fire. No injuries or exposures at this time.; FS 7; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 6; BC10 BC12 E289 E298 E77 E81 E89 RA7 RA77 RA98 T89 T98; CH9; 17; Lyndsey Lantz

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0815; 12:11PM; 1730 E Washington Bl; MAP: <a href="https://bit.ly/3VFgLm7" target="_blank" rel="noopener">https://bit.ly/3VFgLm7</a>; Central-Alameda; Firefighters extinguished flames in this recycling yard within 18 minutes. Crews remain on-scene for overhaul. No injuries were reported, and there was no escalation or hazard beyond the initial involved property.; FS 17; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 9; BC1 BC11 E14 E17 E209 E221 E9 RA17 RA814 T21 T9; CH9; 12; Lyndsey Lantz

Recycling Yard Fire; INC#0815; 11:53AM; 1730 E Washington Bl; MAP: <a href="https://bit.ly/3VFgLm7" target="_blank" rel="noopener">https://bit.ly/3VFgLm7</a>; #Central-Alameda; Initial arriving companies report a recycling facility on fire, no exposures, all fire in outside yard. Crews are working to extinguish the flames and determine the exact contents of the property. The immediate surrounding area is closed to traffic.; FS 17; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 9; BC1 BC11 E14 E17 E209 E221 E9 RA17 RA814 T21 T9; CH9; 12; Lyndsey Lantz
